metadata.title: CVE-2021-45262 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid free vulnerability exists in gpac 1.1.0 via thegf_sg_command_del function, which causes a segmentation fault andapplication crash.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
